Articles.Content: Hullo ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I came here looking fore something new and interesting, and I find... THIS.
> I didn't know it was possible to laugh and cringe at the same time

That exactly what you wanted. It's very new and very interesting ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Potatto, as per the add-on posting rules, could you please include a licence in the download and the forum post? Thanks!

> 
> This is hilarious. Cant wait to see Scott's reaction to this ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

A few posts above you was a response from Scott Manley himself:

> 
> Of course it's legit.
> is it wise? that's the real question.

I genuinely don't know how to react, I had such a huge laugh I almost spilled my coffee and my headache is gone. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Looks like Annoying Orange grew a face and stuck it on a kerbal.

Reminds me a bit of rathergood.

HE LIKES THE MUUUUUUUUN

CUZ HE IZ CLOOOSE TO EET

DO YOU WANT NIGHTMARES ? BECAUSE THIS IS HOW TO GET NIGHTMARES 

this so funny dude

Oh, i praise to the heavens.

Scott, if you see this monstrocity(or maybe review it in a video), please forgive this semi-innocent being for making them.

Guys, Guys!!!! I have a problem here... I can't find .psd file with this face... It's just gone and after that I found ScottManley666.exe in task manager. What does it mean? What is awaiting for me? I'm scared.

What is seen cannot be unseen.

I will not sleep tonight.
